title: The Agreement
description: He's my brother’s best friendAlso my new bossAnd now my fake husband...Cade ‘the King’ Kingston, billionaire grumphole and the most sought-after sportsperson on the continent.He’s also London’s most notorious bachelor with a ten-pack and a profile that would make Adonis weep.Too bad he’s ruthless has a heart made of ice and is the most unfeeling brute I have ever met.When my brother asks him to look out for me while he’s away, Cade engages me as his new Communications Manager.Now he’s my boss, I definitely don’t want to get involved with him.But I’ve harbored a secret crush on Cade, and when we start working together in close proximity, my feelings for him multiply.When a stalker targets me, Cade proposes a fake marriage for my protection.But he has secrets of his own...This is a swoony, angsty, banter-filled romance featuring a woman in over her head, a man in over his heart, and a Champagne loving Great Dane who plays matchmaker by mistake. It stands alone and comes complete with grand romantic gestures.
author: L. Steele
